TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConversationSortOrder extends System.Enum

summary.span: Определяет порядок, в какую беседу узлов должны возвращаться метод.

span.span: Defines the order in which conversation nodes should be returned by the method.

summary.span: Перечисление используется для клиентов, относящихся к Exchange Online и версии Exchange, начиная с Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The enumeration is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ConversationSortOrder DateOrderAscending = int32(2)

summary.span: Порядке на основе последней даты в дереве узлов.

span.span: Chronological order based on the last date in the node tree.

summary.span: В поле DateOrderAscending используется для клиентов, относящихся к Exchange Online и версии Exchange, начиная с Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The DateOrderAscending field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ConversationSortOrder DateOrderDescending = int32(3)

summary.span: Обратном порядке на основе последней даты в дереве узлов.

span.span: Reverse chronological order based on the last date in the node tree.

summary.span: В поле DateOrderDescending используется для клиентов, относящихся к Exchange Online и версии Exchange, начиная с Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The DateOrderDescending field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ConversationSortOrder TreeOrderAscending = int32(0)

summary.span: Дерево происходит по возрастанию основанным на расположение в дереве узлов.

span.span: The tree order is ascending based on the position in the node tree.

summary.span: В поле TreeOrderAscending используется для клиентов, относящихся к Exchange Online и версии Exchange, начиная с Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The TreeOrderAscending field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ConversationSortOrder TreeOrderDescending = int32(1)

summary.span: Дерево по убыванию основанным на расположение в дереве узлов.

span.span: The tree order is descending based on the position in the node tree.

summary.span: В поле TreeOrderDescending используется для клиентов, относящихся к Exchange Online и версии Exchange, начиная с Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The TreeOrderDescending field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
